Druidic Focus.Name: Sprig of Mistletoe
Druidic Focus.Description: A sprig of mistletoe, often used as a Druidic Focus for casting spells.

Druidic Focus.Name: Totem
Druidic Focus.Description: A small totem or figurine representing an animal spirit, used as a Druidic Focus for spellcasting.

Druidic Focus.Name: Yew Wand
Druidic Focus.Description: A wand crafted from yew wood, used by druids as a focus for their spells.

Druidic Focus.Name: Holly and Mistletoe
Druidic Focus.Description: A combination of holly and mistletoe, often used together as a Druidic Focus.

Druidic Focus.Name: Wooden Staff
Druidic Focus.Description: A wooden staff, often carved with nature-themed designs, used as a Druidic Focus for spellcasting.
